scripts.build: . ./.env && docker build --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --build-arg AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --build-arg AWS_ENDPOINT_URL_S3=$AWS_ENDPOINT_URL_S3 -t dev-server:$npm_package_version .
scripts.push: daytona snapshot push --disk 1 dev-server:$npm_package_version --name dev-server:$npm_package_version --entrypoint "pnpm dev --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
